messages.title: Delivering for Ealing & Acton
messages.content: Jon Ball has a record of action and success for people in Ealing and Acton.

messages.title: OUR NHS...AT RISK
messages.content: "We’ve lived through this mistake for 60 years now.... The reality is it [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller..." - Tory Health spokesman summer 2009

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to save accident and emergency services from closure threats.
Opposes overdevelopment of central Ealing, neglect of Acton and Chiswick, Heathrow airport expansion, and threats to local hospitals.
Vince Cable’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

issues.economy: Vince Cable’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.
issues.governance: Opposes overdevelopment of central Ealing, neglect of Acton and Chiswick, Heathrow airport expansion, and threats to local hospitals.
issues.health: Fighting to save accident and emergency services from closure threats.

housing.content: Opposes the construction of an overbearing 40-storey skyscraper.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jon Ball has a record of action and success for people in Ealing and Acton.

politicalExperience.role: Representative for Ealing Common ward on Ealing Council

contactInformation.address: 38 South Ealing Road, Ealing, London W5 4QA

quotes.text: "We’ve lived through this mistake for 60 years now.... The reality is it [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller..." - Tory Health spokesman summer 2009
Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes a form for constituents to indicate support for Jon Ball and to request a poster or contact from the campaign.
